name: Nitro Blood
description:
Nitro Blood is a 3D drag racing game based on NHRA classes

Controls:

  • WASD to move (only turn whilst moving)
  • E+W when Racing
  • W+S to Burnout
  • R to Reset ( Many Bugs!)
  • ESC to Pause

Nitro Blood is in VERY Early development and many features are on there way for example:

  • Other Cars (Funny Car, Top Fuel, etc)
  • Sounds
  • Mobile Release
  • Multiple Tracks

This is my first game made in unity 3d and making this game has been so great.

I understand that there may be things you want different or bugs to report if you do you can contact me via email here: Icecreamscience101@gmail.com or by commenting on the games page

Thanks For Checking My Game Out!
